line_1: Of all your friends, when at your last resource,
line_2: Avoid the man that deals in words of course.
So speed you in your course,

line_1: And aid the labouring oars, their tedious last resource.
line_2: Strong ran the tide against the vessel's course,

line_1: And aid the labouring oars, their tedious last resource.
line_2: Steady to bear against its rapid force,

line_1: And bids his active mind design some swift resource.
line_2: While sweeping o'er the sand it mocks their force.

line_1: And bids his active mind design some swift resource.
line_2: To his oft tried assistance has recourse,

line_1: And breasts the adverse tide. Ah, rash resource!
line_2: For plunging 'mid the deep, with generous force,

line_1: And breasts the adverse tide. Ah, rash resource!
line_2: See where the lion's lord pursues thy hardy course!

line_1: Vain pray'r, the coward's weak resource!
No; 'twas their baffled pride whose last resource
line_2: Dragg'd this perdition on their heads by sorce.
